Trade/Device Name(s): Hitachi Clinical Analyzer S TEST Reagent Cartridge C-Reactive Protein (CRP)
Hitachi Clinical Analyzer S TEST Reagent Cartridge CRP
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Hitachi Clinical Analyzer S TEST reagent cartridge CRP, an immunoturbidimetric reagent system for C-reactive protein quantification on the Hitachi Clinical Analyzer platform.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of C-reactive protein in serum, lithium heparin plasma, K3 EDTA plasma, and sodium citrate plasma to aid in the evaluation of tissue injury, infection, and inflammatory disorders in clinical and physician office laboratories.
